concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Java:Type:JEE:EJB) RETURN type as EJB ORDER BY type.fqn

concept.description: Abstract concept that returns all Stateless Session Beans.
Abstract concept that returns all Stateful Session Beans.
Abstract concept that returns all Singleton Beans.
Abstract concept that returns all Message Driven Beans.
Abstract concept that returns all local beans.
Abstract concept that returns all remote beans.
Abstract concept that returns all Schedule-Methods.
Labels methods of EJBs with "JEE" and "Transactional".
concept.cypher: MATCH (transactionalClass:Java:Type:JEE:EJB)-[:DECLARES]->(transactionalMethod:Java:Method) WHERE NOT ( transactionalMethod:Constructor OR (transactionalMethod.static IS NOT NULL and transactionalMethod.static) OR transactionalMethod.visibility = "private" ) SET transactionalMethod:JEE:Transactional RETURN transactionalClass as TransactionalClass, collect(transactionalMethod) as TransactionalMethods
MATCH (type:Java:Type:JEE:EJB) SET type:Injectable RETURN type as EJB

constraint.description: Check that Schedule methods are only delared in EJB classes.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (c:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method:Schedule) WHERE NOT c:EJB RETURN c.fqn AS invalidBean, m.name AS scheduledMethodName

constraint.description: Stateful Session Beans should be avoided.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:EJB:Stateful) RETURN type AS `Stateful Session Bean`
